title: 関数の応用6
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#c586c0>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#358cd6>int</color> func<color=#ffd700>(</color>int a,int d,int n<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
	<color=#c586c0>if</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>n == 0<color=#ffd700>)</color> <color=#c586c0>return</color> a;
	<color=#c586c0>return</color> func<color=#ffd700>(</color>???<color=#ffd700>)</color> + <color=#ffd700>(</color>a + d*n<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
	<color=#358cd6>int</color> a = 2,d = 3,n = 3;

	printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d"</color>,a<color=#ffd700>)</color>;

<color=#ffd700>}</color>
